CustomField.description: Number of days between today and the `Most Recent Sales Activity` date stamp, or the number of days the Account has been owned if there hasn't been any activity yet.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Number of days between today and the `Most Recent Sales Activity` date stamp, or the number of days the Account has been owned if there hasn't been any activity yet.
CustomField.label: Days Since Last Sales ROE Activity
